abstract: You don’t have to use the Google Play store on your mobile device to get software, as you can shop and even install apps from the computer’s browser.
snippet: You don’t have to use the Google Play store on your mobile device to get software, as you can shop and even install apps from the computer’s browser.
lead_paragraph: Q. I sometimes look at apps on the Google Play website with my computer. When I am on an app description page, it sometimes says the app is not compatible with my device, and sometimes the page incorrectly says I don’t have any devices. Where does it get this information?

headline.main: Shopping for Android Apps on the Web
